title: Major Player

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Dance Partners- (Day) Dance partners are revealed to each other at the start of the Night. Dance partners get a private chat with each other during the night, and Attacks between Dance partners are 2 tiers higher than they typically would be, and any Attacks between non-Dance partners are 1 tier lower than they typically would be for the Night.
Rhythmic Rockin’- (Day) [Cheat] Target a player. They will play a rhythm minigame of the host’s discretion during the next night. If they fail, they will be hit with an Astral Unstoppable Attack
Star of the Show- (Night) [Cheat] All attacks against Cogs that you would survive tonight are redirected to you.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-The rhythm minigame should be of REASONABLE DIFFICULTY. Please, hosts.
-Redirected attackers will know that they were redirected.
